response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and is worth $1,500,000 to me personally. Considering its immense worth and unique features, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects the quality and potential value it holds for you, while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 1200000}
